body.p: After providing services, the entity obtains additional information about the patient including a review of the services provided, standard rates for such services and the patient’s ability and intention to pay the entity for the services provided. During the review, the entity notes its standard rate for the services provided in the emergency room is CU10,000. The entity also reviews the patient’s information and to be consistent with its policies designates the patient to a customer class based on the entity’s assessment of the patient’s ability and intention to pay.
